query:
SELECT 
  wl.id as log_id,
  wl.training_date,
  wl.status,
  wl.day_name,
  s.name as student_name,
  COUNT(wle.id) as total_exercises,
  SUM(COALESCE(wle.completedSets, 0)) as total_sets,
  SUM(COALESCE(wle.totalVolume, 0)) as total_volume
FROM workout_logs wl
JOIN students s ON wl.studentId = s.id
LEFT JOIN workout_log_exercises wle ON wle.workoutLogId = wl.id
WHERE s.name LIKE '%Bruno%'
GROUP BY wl.id, wl.training_date, wl.status, wl.day_name, s.name
ORDER BY wl.training_date DESC
LIMIT 20;
